subject: Call for Paper
body:
2nd International Conference on Electrical, Communication and Computer Engineering

(ICECCE-2020)

Istanbul, Turkey

14-15 April, 2020

http://www.icecce.com



Dear Authors,

We cordially invite you to attend and submit your papers for the IEEE International 
Conference on Electrical, Communication, and Computer Engineering (ICECCE 2020), 
which will take place at Bilek Hotel, Istanbul, Turkey on 14-15 April 2020. 
The event will be highly international with the technical collaboration of 
Gazi University, Ankara, Turkey, Aksaray University, Turkey, University of 
Buner, Pakistan, International Islamic University Islamabad, Pakistan, and 
IEEE Turkey section.

This two-day conference will be held at the beautiful city of Istanbul. ICECCE 
2020 aims to bring together leading academic and industrial researchers, scientists, 
engineers and practitioners to exchange the latest research ideas, methods, 
results, and share experiences, on all theoretical, experimental and applied 
aspects of Electrical, Communication and Computer Engineering. ICECCE 2020 
will provide a unique interdisciplinary and multidisciplinary forum for researchers, 
practitioners and educators to present and discuss the most recent innovations, 
trends, practical challenges encountered and intelligent solutions adopted 
in their respective fields

The conference covers many topics under areas of Electrical, Communication 
and Computer Engineering and can be seen at http://www.icecce.com.

We shall be looking forward to your paper contributions and participation. 
We hope that attending the conference will provide an opportunity to meet academic 
and industry experts to exchange ideas about the latest technologies. We are 
sure that your stay in the beautiful and historic city of Istanbul will be 
very pleasant and enjoyable.

Important Dates:
Paper Due : 15th January, 2020Acceptance Notification : 15th February, 2020Camera 
Ready Due : 1st March, 2020

Registration Deadline:
Early Bird : 20th February, 2020

Conference Dates:
14th -15th April 2020

Venue:Bilek Hotel, Istanbul, Turkey

Paper Submission:
https://easychair.org/conferences/?conf=icecce2020

http://www.icecce.com/call-for-papers/



Regards,
Conference Organizing Team,ICECCE 2020http://www.icecce.com



Let us meet in the heart of Istanbul, the magnificent city with unique beauty, 
history, culture, and international lifestyle, in addition to bringing two 
continents together!

Contact us:
Athar WaseemConference Executive ChairE-mail: athar.waseem@iiu.edu.pk Phone: 
+92 334 8677790

Dr. Yunus UZUNConference Technical ChairE-mail: yunusuzun38@hotmail.com Phone: 
+90 532 6425237



Unsubscribe
